EmailTemplate.name: Oct29Webinar-SourcingTalent.We.Missed.You
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry We Missed You - Resources from our Talent Sourcing webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Webinar Registrant}},
You were missed at MBO's webinar titled "Sourcing Talent for 2013 and Beyond: Whose Job is it, Anyway?" held on Tuesday, October 29. Jay Lash, VP of Market Strategies, joined two talent acquisition specialists to discuss their perspective on talent sourcing and expert recruiting techniques.
If you have any questions about how MBO's solution fits into your enterprise, feel free to respond to this email or call me at 703-793-6014. Below you will find links related to the presentation: Webinar Recording <http://video.mbopartners.com/players/pu1PgfkY-mMm4x1IW.html> Webinar Slide Deck <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/Slides%20from%20Our%20Webinar%20on%20Sourcing%20Talent%20for%202013%20and%20Beyond.pdf> <http://sig.org/webinars.php> State of Independence Report <http://www.mbopartners.com/state-of-independence/independent-workforce-index.html> Post-Webinar Survey <http://www.surveymonkey.com/s/WJFYMPY>
